author: p_bitfly
content: hope this is the right channel, currently it is very easy to identify validating nodes by their attestation subnetwork subscriptions that are advertized via the p2p protocol. this makes them an easy dos target, wouldn't it make sense for all nodes to subscribe to a random number of attestation subnetworks to not make validating nodes that easy to identify?

author: nishant0
content:
that is kind of the case currently, all validators are randomly subscribed to subnets:
https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/dev/specs/phase0/validator.md#phase-0-attestation-subnet-stability

author: nishant0
content: not really a foolproof way, but it does help
